turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order two larger pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken bacon ranch on one, and extra pepperoni on the other.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large pizzas, one chicken bacon ranch, and one with extra pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be it. Thank you.
